articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets Chinese Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Monday met with Liu Hongcai, new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					 He welcomed the new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK and had a warm talk with him.
					
					 He provided a dinner party for the ambassador.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jang Song Thaek and Kim Yong Il, department directors of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The party proceeded in a cordial atmosphere.

articles.title: KPA Warns Any Act of Disturbing Security and Order in DMZ
articles.content:
KPA Warns Any Act of Disturbing Security and Order in DMZ
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- These days witness a lot of serious developments in the area along the Military Demarcation Line where huge armed forces are standing in acute confrontation for which the south Korean military authorities are to blame. They may drive the present touch-and-go situation to a more dangerous phase.
					A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army issued a statement on Monday in this regard: 
					
					The south Korean military warmongers have been busy staging an anti-DPRK psychological warfare in the Demilitarized Zone with agents specializing in this warfare and other riff-raffs involved since the mid-February under the signboards of "visit," "tour" and "observance".
					
					It is a well-known fact that the south Korean military concluded what it called "MOU on supporting news coverage of the DMZ" with 15 media organizations in a bid to let their reporters tour not only the DMZ but nearby frontline areas and prepare materials for anti-north smear campaigns and release them by means of newspapers, broadcasting services, internet, etc.
					
					As already known to the world, Paragraph 9 of Article 1 of the Armistice Agreement stipulates that "No person, military or civilian, shall be permitted to enter the Demilitarized Zone except persons concerned with the conduct of civil administration and relief and persons specially authorized to enter by the Military Armistice Commission."
					
					It is preposterous for the U.S. and south Korean sides to allow those who have nothing to do with the civil administration and relief to enter the DMZ, given that the Military Armistice Commission was completely demised and the military machines of both sides tasked to supervise and control the implementation of the AA in place of the commission have not been in existence for nearly two decades due to the deliberate moves of the U.S. to scrap the AA.
					
					In the final analysis, all these moves of the south Korean military warmongers cannot be interpreted otherwise than deliberate acts to turn the DMZ into theatre of confrontation with the DPRK and a site of psychological warfare against the north in disregard of the AA and strain the overall situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. is a signatory to the AA and responsible for implementing it. 
					
					It is, therefore, obliged to stop the moves of the south Korean military authorities to misuse the DMZ for meeting their sinister purpose.
					
					The U.S. side should cogitate about the grave situation in which the security and order in the DMZ which have so far been observed for form's sake are disturbed and this area is turning into a total military zone and a theatre of inter-Korean confrontation and a site of psychological warfare against the north in contravention of the AA.
					
					The Panmunjom Mission of the KPA clarifies the following principled stand to cope with the prevailing situation:
					
					1. The U.S. side should force the south Korean authorities and military warmongers to halt at once their moves to disturb the security and order in the DMZ if it is interested in the peace and security on the peninsula as a signatory to the AA.
					
					2. The south Korean military warmongers should roll back without delay their foolish plan to turn the DMZ into a theatre of confrontation with the DPRK and a site of psychological warfare against the north and stop their rash acts, if they want to escape the unexpected strike of the KPA.
					
					3. If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities persist in their wrong acts to misuse the DMZ for the inter-Korean confrontation despite our warnings, these will entail unpredictable incidents including the loss of human lives in this area for which the U.S. side will be wholly to blame.
					
					Intolerable is any act of disturbing the security and order in the DMZ.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Refutes Anti-DPRK "Resolution" at UN
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Refutes Anti-DPRK "Resolution" at UN
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Monday as regards the adoption of an anti-DPRK "resolution" at the meeting of the UN Human Rights Council:
					 The 13th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council high-handedly adopted an anti-DPRK "resolution" keynote of which is to extend the term of the "special rapporteur" on human rights issue in the DPRK.
					
					 Just like the "resolution" adopted last year, the above-said resolution is peppered with distortions and fabrications and it is a product of a politically motivated plot of the U.S. and Japan to get the system in the DPRK degenerate and destabilize it under the signboard of protecting human rights. EU played the role of a midwife this time, too, after choosing the road of confrontation with the DPRK, denying dialogue and cooperation over the human rights issue and following the forces hostile to it.
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK has never recognized the anti-DPRK "resolutions" which have been adopted high-handedly every year since 2003 and the "special rapporteurs" appointed according to them but categorically rejected them.
					
					 The "special rapporteur" being applied to some anti-U.S. and independent countries only is a leftover typical of selectivity and double standards disregarding impartiality and objectivity in dealing with human rights.
					
					 The Universal Periodic Review which deals with all the UN member nations on the basis of equality has displayed its vitality since its establishment and it is, therefore, an anachronistic action and a blatant challenge to this review to insist on the "special rapporteur" still today.
					
					 It is nothing but a daydream to bring about changes in the DPRK by means of confrontation and pressure.
					
					 The DPRK will smash the hostile forces' moves for hatching plots against the DPRK over the human rights issue and further reinforce the system for ensuring human rights under socialism chosen by its people themselves.

articles.title: KJU Assails S. Korean Conservative to Turn Media into Its Tools
articles.content:
KJU Assails S. Korean Conservative to Turn Media into Its Tools 
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea released a statement on Monday denouncing the puppet conservative group for working hard to put the media in south Korea on its payroll in a bid to reduce them to its tools serving the purpose of its fascist dictatorship and incite confrontation against reunification in violation of justice, conscience and truth.
					 The puppet conservative group revised laws on media and replaced leading persons of major media organizations and persons concerned with media institutions with ultra-right conservative elements and took such repressive actions as indiscriminately purging those media persons protesting against its moves, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The conservative media are busy conducting an anti-DPRK false propaganda by using even the misinformation cooked up by riff-raffs including human scum, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The media persons who should lead the times, speak for the people's mindset and advocate justice and truth are reduced to dirty political servants and paid trumpeters of the puppet conservative group censured by the public mindset and the nation to echo its outbursts and join in the smear campaign against fellow countrymen.
					
					 This is as shameful an act as discarding their mission and duty as media persons.
					
					 Only shame and destruction await the reactionary conservative media as they advocate antipathy, distrust and confrontation between fellow countrymen while whitewashing sycophancy and treachery and fascist dictatorship as servants of the group of traitors and political prostitutes.
					
					 The conservative media organizations and hack writers are bound to face a stern punishment by the nation as they are hell-bent on malignantly defiling the dignity and system in the DPRK and releasing false reports about it as trumpeters serving the above-said group.
					
					 The reptile conservative media would be well advised to bear in mind that they will have to pay dearly for falsifying the reality and stoking confrontation quite contrary to the mindset of the people.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets New Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets New Pakistani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Arif Mahmood, new Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the DPRK Olympic Committee took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday. 
					 Present there were members of the committee and officials in the field of physical culture and sports. 
					
					 The meeting summed up the work of the committee for Juche 98 (2009) and discussed on the orientation of its work for Juche 99 (2010). 
					
					 A report of Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and chairman of the committee, was followed by speeches. 
					
					 They referred to the fact that last year the committee intensified its work and as a result the DPRK was qualified for 2010 World Cup and achieved successes at international games. 
					
					 They proposed tasks and ways to further enhance the function and role of the committee and the associations of different sports events and bring about a radical turn in the work of physical culture and sports of the country this year.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Global Steel Holdings Limited of India led by Chairman Pramod Mittal and a delegation of the Kanagawa Prefectural Citizen's Society for Promoting the Normalization of Japan-DPRK Diplomatic Relations headed by Akihiro Harada, co-representative of the Central Headquarters of the Japanese Side to the Fact-finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans, arrived here today by air

articles.title: Preparations for New School Year Get Brisk
articles.content:
Preparations for New School Year Get Brisk
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Brisk preparations for a new school year are going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The educational institutions have already finished teaching programs for a new school year and equipped themselves with more experimental facilities and apparatuses.
					
					 Universities have paid a deep concern to encouraging teachers to steadily improve teaching contents and methods and their scientific, theoretical and practical qualifications to meet the requirements of the developing situation.
					
					 Having organized teaching contests and exhibitions of visual aid materials, videos, experimental apparatuses and teaching tools, they are making preparations for a proper combination of the practical education with experiment and training.
					
					 Teachers of the secondary and primary schools across the country, too, have pushed ahead with the preparatory work for a new school year.
					
					 Nation-wide assistance to the educational institutions has also played a big role in the preparations for a new school year.
					
					 Printing, paper and daily necessities factories are giving priority to producing school supplies.
					
					 Ministries and national institutions such as the Ministry of Light Industry, the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry and the Bureau for Quality Control of the DPRK have sent up-to-date teaching apparatuses to universities, including Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology.

articles.title: KCNA on Despicable Inside Story about Megaphone War
articles.content:
KCNA on Despicable Inside Story about Megaphone War
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- There is now a deluge of "news" about the internal situation in the DPRK from the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					 Various kinds of "reports" are pouring in to give impression that "contingency" is imminent in the DPRK and wild rumors about even the health of the supreme leader are afloat. There are "analysis and comment" that shortage of food and economic difficulties are more serious than those in the 1990s due to the "failure of monetary reform".
					
					 There is also misinformation that the DPRK continues missile and other arms smuggling, its nuclear capacity is being steadily bolstered up, there is concern about its possible proliferation of nuclear weapons and it is opening Rajin Port and sending workers to foreign countries en masse in a bid to earn foreign currency due to financial difficulties.  The scenario for vituperation seems to know no bound.
					
					 The campaign to mislead the public opinion by concentrically and malignantly tarnishing the image of the other party by such specialized methods and means of psychological warfare has been called a black propaganda campaign. This campaign naturally seeks an aim. Behind this despicable propaganda are forces displeased with any investment in the DPRK. It is aimed at holding in check investment in the DPRK in a bid to hamstring its efforts to improve the people's standard of living by focusing efforts on economic construction. 
					
					 After bolstering up its nuclear deterrent strong enough to check the outbreak of a war in the Korean Peninsula, the government of the DPRK has been concentrating its efforts on the economic construction and the improvement of people's standard of living since last year. While expanding its external economic relations, the DPRK is making a switchover to actively introducing investment from other countries. The world's interest in making investment in the DPRK is growing exceptionally strong as it has powerful war deterrent as well as tremendous economic foundations and potentials and inexhaustible resources and as it is located in an economically and geographically favorable region.
					
					 The hostile forces seek to stem this trend. When the DPRK becomes rich economically, there will be no use of "economic lever" to be applied against it. They had already employed such coercive means as sanctions. But the "resolutions on sanctions" of the United Nations Security Council were not enough to hinder the overall routine economic activities of the DPRK because they are confined to the munitions field. That is why those forces are getting hell-bent on the unethical moves to suffocate not only the civilian industry but also the fields related to the people's living by describing the system in the DPRK as "unstable one" to check foreign investment in it.
					
					 The objective of their black propaganda is not confined to this. At present the U.S. administration finds itself in such difficult internal situation that it can hardly take any sincere approach toward the DPRK-proposed negotiations for the conclusion of a peace treaty and the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. With the midterm elections slated to take place in forthcoming November, the Obama administration is under the weight of fear that it might be censured for its weakness in external relations. 
					
					 It contends that its start of negotiations with the DPRK may create the "danger" of betraying its weakness. However, for the U.S. to remain doing nothing would bring it the label of incompetence. Hence, the Obama administration advocated "strategic patience." In other words, it contends this attitude is not prompted by its incompetence and it does not make haste but waits for something as the DPRK government seems not to last long. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities have a similar daydream under the signboard of "waiting is a strategy".
					
					 History proves that one's shameless swindling to get rid of one's poor position by slandering others is bound to seriously backfire.
					
					 When the U.S., Japan and south Korean authorities came out with a "waiting strategy," vociferating about "theory of collapse" in the 1990s, the DPRK responded to it with the victorious conclusion of the "Arduous March" and the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-1. And when the U.S. again came out with "a waiting strategy," talking about "an axis of evil" and "preemptive nuclear attack" in the first decade of the new century the DPRK reacted to it with two successful nuclear tests and launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2. 
					
					 They would be well advised to remember that the DPRK has a firm foundation of the independent national economy which remains solid despite any storm from outside.
					
					 The DPRK will witness the appearance of a light water reactor power plant relying on its own nuclear fuel in the near future in the 2010s in the wake of mass-production of Juche iron and Juche-based vinalon cotton, its reply to them.

articles.title: US Moves for Modernizing Nuclear Weapons Blasted
articles.content:
US Moves for Modernizing Nuclear Weapons Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The United States is set to spend two billion U.S. dollars for modernizing different type nuclear bombs including B-61 now in the process of serial production since 1968 after it was developed in 1963. It is also mulling spending 0.8 billion U.S. dollars for the research and development of new type cruise missiles capable of carrying nuclear weapons and channeling the bulk of its defense budget into improving B-52 and others, according to foreign press reports. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The moves stepped up by the U.S. to modernize nuclear weapons at a time when the demands for nuclear disarmament are growing stronger worldwide are a blatant challenge to the desire of humankind for peace and a criminal act of seriously threatening global peace and security.
					
					 After dividing countries into a group of countries allowed to have access to nuclear weapons and that of countries not allowed to do so the U.S. asserts that international sanctions and pressure should be slapped against the second group, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Furthermore, the U.S. is shutting its eyes to the moves of its allies and followers for nuclear weaponization and patronize them, while encouraging them behind the scene.
					
					 This testifies to the hypocritical nature of the U.S. "initiative for denuclearizing the world".
					
					 The U.S. attitude of reneging on the initiative contrary to its commitment is a mockery of the worldwide efforts for nuclear disarmament and a challenge to peace. The above-said initiative only sounds nonsensical as it lacks any feasibility and effect. It will bring the U.S. to nowhere.
					
					 It would be well advised to stop the hide-and-seek intended to mislead public opinion by ballyhooing about the above-mentioned initiative.
					
					 Should the U.S. persistently rush headlong into a nuclear arms expansion and war of aggression, going against the trend of the times towards disarmament and peace and the demand of mankind, it will not escape international isolation and destruction, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative's Confrontational Moves Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative's Confrontational Moves Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the chief executive of south Korea urged the brasshats of the puppet military to "get fully ready to go into action" against "provocation by the north". The puppet defence minister, too, instructed units of the puppet army to "be on high alert" to cope with possible "emergency" while repeating outbursts about "preemptive attacks" on the DPRK. During his recent foreign tour the minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" malignantly slandered the DPRK's proposal for the conclusion of a peace treaty, essential for the solution to the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, as a "wrong approach" while trying to give impression that the six-party talks have not yet been resumed because of the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such reckless rowdyism of the south Korean conservative group is pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' policy of aggression on the DPRK in every aspect. It is, therefore, a deliberate and premeditate provocation prompted by the criminal design to ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK at any cost in collusion with the U.S. imperialists when an opportunity presents itself while completely bedeviling the north-south relations, hamstringing the process for the establishment of peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and rendering the confrontation and tension between the north and the south to the extremity.
					
					 The threat of aggression in the Korean Peninsula comes from south Korea which turned into the U.S. imperialists' biggest nuclear advance base in the Far East and a military ground of ceaseless large-scale DPRK-targeted war exercises of various forms.
					
					 There is no change in the south Korean puppet conservative group's criminal ambition to totally bedevil the inter-Korean relations through unprecedented frantic confrontation with the DPRK and war moves, stem the trend of the June 15 era of reunification and launch an invasion of the DPRK at any cost in collusion with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 However, the puppet warmongers will get nothing but shameful destruction in showdown with the DPRK.
					
					 It is disposition and mettle of the DPRK to return fire for fire and deal a heavy blow of Songun at any attempt to invade the DPRK. Out of its heavy responsibility for peace of the peninsula and security of the nation, the DPRK will never tolerate the puppet warmongers bringing the dark clouds of nuclear war in collusion with foreign forces to hang over the nation but certainly force them to pay thousand-fold prices for such crime.

articles.title: Working Class Called upon to Increase Its Vanguard Role
articles.content:
Working Class Called upon to Increase Its Vanguard Role 
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon the working class to usher in a great heyday for Songun Korea by taking the lead in effecting a great surge, united close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The working class is the vanguard steering the era of great surge and a mainstay for building an economic power, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 It was the working class that played a vanguard role in bringing about a great surge as it built a socialist power from scratch in the post-war period by dashing ahead at the speed of Chollima in hearty response to the call of President Kim Il Sung. It was again the working class which brought about miracles and innovations, ushering in a great heyday in the era of the Workers' Party by loudly sounding the revolution. The working class in the DPRK is strong in faith as it emerged victorious in the "Arduous March" by building up national defence industry of Songun despite the worst adversity. 
					
					 It is making a breakthrough in the heroic advance to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation, holding high the torch of a new great revolutionary surge kindled by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The workers of the Songjin Steel Complex completed the Juche iron production system last year which witnessed dramatic changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country. Those of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex are bringing about a steady boost in production in the van of the drive for a significant improvement in the people's standard of living this year. The heroic workers in the field of vinalon industry brought a great auspicious event to the whole country by building a modern vinalon factory.
					
					 These eye-opening realities represent the laudable successes which can be made only by the working class under the uplifted slogan "When the Party is determined, we can do anything!"
					
					 The editorial stresses the need for the working class to turn out as one in hearty response to the call of the Party and dash ahead in the van of the on-going drive for radically improving the people's standard of living with the same vim and vigor with which it brought about great innovations and leap forward in the 150-day and 100-day campaigns to successfully materialize the plan of the Party to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK April Holidays Mark in Russia and Ethiopia
articles.content:
DPRK April Holidays Mark in Russia and Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition and a film show took place in Myanmar and film shows in Russia and Ethiopia between Mar. 17 and 23 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the revolutionary histories and feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", "Night of Pyongyang" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon City Development Committee of Myanmar noted that the President is the great leader of the Korean people who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years to defeat the Japanese imperialists and liberate the country and that under his wise leadership Korea, which suffered an eclipse on the world map in the past, turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK's cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation would surely emerge victorious as there are the solid foundations for a thriving nation laid by Kim Il Sung throughout his whole life and the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The manager of a gem factory in Russia said it is entirely thanks to the Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il that the DPRK is now confidently advancing along the road chosen by itself despite the pressure of the U.S. and other hostile forces. Under his Songun leadership the DPRK has secured the powerful war deterrent nobody dare provoke, the manager added.
					
					 Speakers at the film show in Ethiopia expressed belief that the people of the DPRK would open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded in Mexico
Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, issued a statement titled "President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" on Mar. 22 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					Praising Kim Il Sung as the gifted thinker-theoretician who showed the bright road for mankind to follow in the era of independence, the statement said:
					
					He founded the immortal Juche idea that the popular masses are masters of the revolution and construction and they are also the motive force of them.
					
					This was a historic event that opened up the era of independence, a new era of human history.
					
					The Juche idea winning the hearts of all people is displaying its great vitality on a worldwide scale as well as in Korea.
					
					The President is the sun of mankind as he bestowed the warm benevolence not only on the Korean people but also on the world people regardless of differences in race, nationality, ideology, political view and religious belief.
					
					The President received a total of more than 70 000 foreigners in his lifetime, among them people of different strata from party and state leaders to ordinary persons.
					
					All the prominent figures of the world, honored with the audience of the President, were deeply moved by his noble personality.
					
					When the President passed away unexpectedly in July 1994 the world people felt as if the heaven collapsed and the sun faded away.
					
					But the sun is everlasting.
					
					As the sun is eternal, the President is always alive with mankind.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- On April 8, Juche 51 (1962), President Kim Il Sung gave officials important instructions with regard to the production of bean curd and its supply to the people in the capital city of Pyongyang.
					 The President said bean curd rich in protein content and nice in taste was of weighty significance in the diet and that neither a large factory nor complex equipment was necessary but small factories were enough for the bean curd production.
					
					 He also said that when bean curd factories were built in different places, it would be possible to easily solve the shortage of manpower. He then told the officials to take measures to produce various kinds of bean curd for the citizens.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
						
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					Los artistas pusieron en la escena diversas piezas entre otras el preludio de musica orquestal "Al camarada Kim Jong Il", la orquesta de cuerda "Ha venido el Lider a nuestro puesto militar", la musica orquestal "Mas alto y mas rapido", "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta" y "Mi tierra natal", la sinfonia "La querida casa en mi tierra natal", la orquesta de cuerda por el trio de instrumento viento de bambu y el pizzicato "La cancion de la muchacha" y la musica orquestal "Encanto" y "Es mejor nuestro General".
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron con alto orgullo la trayectoria gloriosa de la revolucion coreana y demostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de llevar a cabo la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera con la gran bandera del Songun en alto.
					
					Mediante el eco particular de la musica orquestal combinada y la armonia bien organizada, ellos ofrecieron el rico perfume nacional y manifestaron plenamente el profundo sentimiento de la musica orquestal, de manera que mostraron claramente la justicia y vitalidad de la orientacion literaria y artistica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de realizar estrictamente al estilo coreano la creacion, la disposicion y la descripcion.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio con la mano levantada  en alto a la aclamacion entusiasta de los ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito los exitos de la funcion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional ofrecieron la magnifica funcion con alta habilidad artistica, evaluo altamente sus exitos y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					Deben satisfacer suficientemente la demanda cultural de nuestro pueblo describiendo en lo  hermoso y en lo artistico el noble mundo espiritual de los hombres de la epoca del Songun, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para desarrollar mas la sinfonia autoctona.
					
					Le acompanaron los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos, del CC del PTC, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju y los funcionarios directivos de los dominios de literatura, arte, prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Vocero en Phanmunjom advierte a las autoridades militares surcoreanas
articles.content:
Vocero en Phanmunjom advierte a las autoridades militares surcoreanas
						
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en los ultimos tiempos ocurren en las inmediaciones de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar varios problemas serios por las maquinaciones de las autoridades militares surcoreanas, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion siguiente:
					En los ultimos dias, en los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar donde estan enfrentadas cara a cara las enormes fuerzas armadas, suceden debido a las maniobras de las autoridades militares surcoreanas varios problemas serios que pueden llevar a la fase mas peligrosa la situacion actual en visperas de la guerra. 
					
					Por ejemplo, desde la segunda decena de febrero los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana perpetran la guerra psicologica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el rotulo de la "visita", el "recorrido" y la "observacion" introduciendo a los agentes de la campana psicologica y otros tipejos en la zona desmilitarizada.
					
					Ya esta conocido por todos el que la capa militar surcoreana concerto con los 15 organos de "prensa" la "nota de entendimiento para el apoyo a la seleccion de materiales sobre la zona desmilitarizada" e introdujo a ellos en esta zona y otros lugares del frente para inventar los datos intrigantes anti-RPDC y publicarlos a traves de los periodicos, radioemisiones e Internet. 
					
					Como esta anunciado a todo el mundo, el parrafo 9 de primer articulo del Acuerdo de Armisticio estipula que "ningun militar o civil puede entrar en la zona desmilitarizada a excepcion de las personas relacionadas con la ejecucion de administracion civil y de socorro y el personal con la permision especial de la Comision Militar de Armisticio".
					
					Ahora, debido a las intencionales maniobras de EE.UU. encaminadas a romper el Acuerdo de Armisticio, se desaparecio completamente la Comision Militar de Armisticio y no existe durante cerca de 20 anos ningun aparato militar bilateral para vigilar y controlar la ejecucion del Acuerdo de Armisticio.
					
					Por tanto, resulta muy ilogico que en tal circunstancia los personajes no tienen nada que ver con la administracion civil y la labor de socorro entraran arbitrariamente en la zona desmilitarizada. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, todos los movimientos de los belicistas militares surcoreanos no son otros sino actos intencionales para convertir la zona desmilitarizada en el campo de confrontacion y de la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC, sin tomar en consideracion el Acuerdo de Armisticio, y agravar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en su conjunto. 
					
					EE.UU. es precisamente el firmante del Acuerdo de Armisticio y una parte responsable de su ejecucion. 
					
					Por tanto, el asume la responsabilidad de impedir las maniobras de las autoridades militares surcoreanas encaminadas a utilizar la zona en cuestion para su objeto malsano. 
					
					EE.UU. debe reflexionarse debidamente de la grave situacion en que se rompen la seguridad y el orden de la zona desmilitarizada, que se han venido manteniendo formalmente hasta ahora, y esta zona se convierte en la zona completamente armada, en el campo de confrontacion Norte-Sur y en el de guerra psicologica anti-RPDC, en desacuerdo con el Acuerdo de Armisticio. 
					
					Frente a la situacion creada, la Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom aclara su posicion de principios como los siguientes:
					
					1. Si la parte norteamericana, firmante del Acuerdo de Armisticio, tiene interes en la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, debe frenar de inmediato las maniobras de las autoridades y belicistas militares del Sur de Corea tendentes a perturbar la seguridad y el orden de la zona desmilitarizada. 
					
					2. Si las fuerzas belicistas militares surcoreanas desean evitar el golpe imprevisible de nuestro ejercito, deben actuar con prudencia abandonando sin demora su absurdo plan de convertir la zona desmilitarizada en el campo de confrontacion y de guerra psicologica anti-RPDC.
					
					3. Si siguen perpetrando, a pesar de nuestras advertencias, los actos siniestros de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas para abusar de la zona desmilitarizada en la confrontacion Norte-Sur, se creara en esta zona una situacion imprevisible como las perdidas humanas, y la responsabilidad por el respecto recaera totalmente sobre la parte norteamericana.
					
					No podra ser tolerado jamas cualquier acto perturbador a la seguridad y orden de la zona desmilitarizada.

articles.title: UPC condena intento de apoderarse de los medios de prensa surcoreano
articles.content:
UPC condena intento de apoderarse de los medios de prensa surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ATCC) -- El vocero del CC de la Union de Periodistas de Corea hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion condenando la banda conservadora titere del Sur de Corea que hace de los medios de prensa los progubernamentales bajo el objeto de pisotear la justicia, la conciencia  y la verdad en el Sur de Corea, usarlos en la dominacion de dictadura fascista y perseguir la confrontacion anti-reunificacion.
					   El documento senala que la camarilla titere  enmendo las leyes relacionadas con la prensa, sustituyo a los hombres de las principales entidades y empresas de prensa por los conservadores extremistas y perpetro la represion sobre este dominio eliminando sin ton ni son a los hombres de palabra que le protestan y prosigue:
					
					  Tambien, los medios de prensa conservadores recurren a la demagogia anti-RPDC repitiendo hasta las desinformaciones inventadas por las basuras humanas y otros tipejos.
					
					  Los medios de prensa que deben ser precursores de la epoca, abogados de la opinion publica y defensores de la justicia y verdad se incorporan a los alborotos intrigantes contra los connacionales siendo sucia sirvienta politica y trompetero venal de la banda conservadora titere. Esto es un acto vergonzoso que contraviene a la mision y deber de la prensa.
					
					  Mereceran la verguenza y la derrota los medios de prensa reaccionarios que al ser lacayos y prostitutas politicas de la banda traidora embellecen el servilismo a las grandes potencias, el acto vendepatria y la dictadura fascista e inculcan la hostilidad, la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento entre los connacionales.
					
					  La nacion coreana sentenciara severamente los medios de prensa y los hombres de palabra comercializados que siendo el trompetero venal anti-reunificacion de la banda traidora calumnian perversamente la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC y actuan desesperadamente para  las desinformaciones.
					
					  Los medios de prensa venales que marchan a contrapelo de la opinion publica, tergiversan la realidad y azuzan la confrontacion pagaran un merecido precio.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el objeto negro de la guerra de megafono
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el objeto negro de la guerra de megafono
  Pyongyang, 29 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, desde EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea se transmiten como lluvias torrenciales las "noticias" sobre la situacion interna de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Se difunden indiscriminadamente las "informaciones" de toda indole tendentes a crear una impresion como si la RPDC estuviera en visperas de la "situacion del brusco cambio" y flotan hasta tales o cuales rumores sobre la salud del dirigente supremo.
					
					  Se oyen los "analisis" de que la crisis de alimento y la economica creadas por el "fracaso de la reforma monetaria" son severas mas que la decada de 1990.
					
					  Ademas, son incontables los guiones de maldiciones incluyendo que la RPDC sigue realizando el contrabando de misiles y otras armas y fortaleciendo de continuo la capacidad nuclear, hay preocupacion de que ella proliferara las armas nucleares, ella dejo abierto el puerto de Rajin para eliminar la crisis financiera y envia en masa los obreros para ganar las divisas.
					
					  Han calificado de la campana de propaganda negra la labor de crear opiniones publicas para desacreditar de manera concentrada el imagen de la contraparte movilizando los metodos psicologicos y medios especializados.
					
					  Es natural que la propaganda negra persiga un objeto. Detras de esta campana negra existen las fuerzas que no desean la inversion extranjera a nuestro pais. Su objeto reside en impedir la inversion a Corea para obstaculizar los esfuerzos de Corea por la mejora de la vida popular concentrando las fuerzas a la construccion economica.
					
					En las condiciones de que fue fortalecido su disuasivo nuclear capaz de detener el estallido de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, el gobierno de la RPDC concentra a partir del ano pasado las fuerzas a la construccion economica y el mejoramiento de la vida popular. Y al ampliar las relaciones economicas exteriores cambia su direccion hacia la introduccion activa de las inversiones de otros paises. Todo el mundo presta la extraordinaria atencion a la inversion sobre Corea que esta dispuesta del firme disuasivo de guerra, poseyo la gran base y potencialidad economicas y los abundantes recursos y se halla en un lugar adecuado en lo economico y geografico.
					
					Esto es precisamente el objeto que las fuerzas hostiles intentan impedir. Si la RPDC fuera rica en lo economico, esas fuerzas podran perder la "palanca economica" para aquella. En el pasado intentaron a aplicar el metodo forzoso como la sancion. Pero, puesto que la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU este limitada con el dominio de materiales belicos ellas no podian poner obstaculos en todas las actividades economicas normales de la RPDC. Por eso, recurren en las maniobras antieticas para asfixiar no solo el dominio civil sino tambien el de la vida popular obstaculizando la inversion mediante la desinformacion como si estuviera inestable el regimen de Corea.
					
					Esto no es el unico objeto de la propaganda negra. Ahora, la administracion norteamericana se ve ante el estado interior imposible para tratar con seriedad las negociaciones por la concertacion del convenio de la paz presentado por la RPDC y por la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. La administracion de Obama, que esta en visperas de las elecciones intermedias en noviembre que viene, se siente la sensacion de presion de que no debiera recibir las calumnias sobre su debilidad en las relaciones exteriores.
					
					El mismo acto de dar inicio a las negociaciones con la RPDC pudiera abrigar el "peligro" de ser calificado como expresion de su debilidad. Sin embargo, si estuviera con brazos cruzados seria evaluada de impotente. Por eso, ella se vio obligada a expresar la "paciencia estrategica". Es decir, quiere mostrar que aunque tiene capacidad esta esperando sin precipitacion porque el poder de la RPDC no pudiera mantenerse largo tiempo.
					
					Tambien, las autoridades surcoreanas tienen el mismo sueno absurdo presentando la tonteria de que "esperar es tambien la estrategia".
					
					La historia demuestra que el descarado fraude de difamar a otro para salir de su situacion pobre traera sin falta un serio efecto contraproducente.
					
					En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado, la RPDC respondio con el triunfo de la "marcha penosa" y el lanzamiento exitoso de satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No.1" a la "estrategia de esperar" en que habian recurrido EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea hablando de la "teoria de derrumbe". Y en primera decada del nuevo siglo, dio respuesta con las dos pruebas nucleares y el exitoso lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong No.2" a la misma estrategia de EE.UU. perpetrada cacareando el "eje de males" y el "ataque nuclear preventivo".
					
					Tienen que recordar que la RPDC tiene la firme base de la economia nacional independiente que no vacilara ante cualquier tempestad exterior.
					
					En la decada de 2010 nuestra respuesta sera, ademas del acero Juche y algodon Juche, la central de agua ligera que en el futuro cercano se pondra en pleno funcionamiento con el propio combustible nuclear.
